name: Paddling and Hiking the Georgian Bay Coast
categories: Paddling and Hiking the Georgian Bay Coast
description: Thirty-eight excursions that take you on hiking routes ranging from hour-long strolls to multi-day (portage-free) paddling expeditions. Includes four regions: north shore Killarney and the French River, eastern shore, the thirty thousand islands, southern shore Severn Sound and Nottawasaga Bay, and western shores of the Bruce Peninsula. Each chapter includes access points, trip planning advice, a list of maps and charts for the area. Includes colour photos to get you inspired.
